org.ietf.nea.pa.attribute

Interface PaAttributeHeaderBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ImAttributeHeaderBuilder, TransmissionObjectBuilder<ImAttributeHeader>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaAttributeHeaderBuilderIetf

    public interface PaAttributeHeaderBuilder
extends ImAttributeHeaderBuilder
    Generic builder to build an integrity measurement attribute header compliant to RFC 5792. It can be used in a fluent way.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PaAttributeHeaderBuilder setFlags(byte flags)
      Sets the attribute flags encoded in one byte.

      Sets the attribute length.
